Brenda Snipes herself confirmed her part: correcting someone who mistakenly believed she was a Republican.
Multiple media reports: including the South Florida Sun Sentinel, consistently refer to Snipes' Democratic affiliation.
Snipes: biography on the Broward County supervisor of elections website lists her as a Democrat.
NBC: s Andrea Mitchell initially claimed that Snipes is a Republican, but this statement was later corrected as inaccurate.
